Question
========
An ammeter is connected in _________ and a voltmeter is connected in ________.

Answerlist
----------
* series, series
* series, parallel
* parallel, series
* parallel, parallel

Solution
========
An ammeter is connected in series and a voltmeter is connected in parallel.
